org.intermine.bio.dataconversion

Class GFF3Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.dataconversion.DataConverter
      • org.intermine.bio.dataconversion.GFF3Converter

  • public class GFF3Converter
extends DataConverter
    Class to read a GFF3 source data and produce a data representation

    • Constructor Detail

      • GFF3Converter

        public GFF3Converter(ItemWriter writer,
             java.lang.String seqClsName,
             java.lang.String orgTaxonId,
             java.lang.String dataSourceName,
             java.lang.String dataSetTitle,
             Model tgtModel,
             GFF3RecordHandler handler,
             GFF3SeqHandler sequenceHandler)
              throws ObjectStoreException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        writer - ItemWriter
        seqClsName - The class of the coordinate system for this GFF3 file (generally Chromosome)
        orgTaxonId - The taxon ID of the organism we are loading
        dataSourceName - name for dataSource
        dataSetTitle - title for dataSet
        tgtModel - the model to create items in
        handler - object to perform optional additional operations per GFF3 line
        sequenceHandler - the GFF3SeqHandler use to create sequence Items
        Throws:
        ObjectStoreException - if something goes wrong
